text: Now loading Androidify body parts from the web dynamically. May have hit a snag with accessories and some of the stuff that can show up on a droid. Will need a bunch of goofy droids to test with.
Currently refactoring a LOT of crummy old flat file code that it used to use to load these things.
as a result of this changeover, we reduced the size of the apk by ~5mb and runtime memory usage for Androidify is now hovering in the high 40's - mid 50's
